name: Super Car Rally Winter
description:
Rally, Racing your dream super sports car on fantastic winter environment
Rally, racing your super dream sports car around nice environment
This is very basic of racing , rally super sports car game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of super sports car , nice winter environment
- Simple controls to control and drive your dream super sports car on nice environment of snowy winter
- Gas, break buttons to control your racing , rally super sports car
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally super sports car
- Swing your device to control your super sports car steer
- Camera button to change your view of racing , rally super sports car
